message: ZARA COMPREHENSIVE IMPLEMENTATION TEST: Fix, optimize and update the admin agent consulting chat interface to make it user-friendly for Sandra to monitor agents in real-time. Requirements: 1) Analyze current DualModeAgentChat, StreamingAgentChat, and UnifiedAgentInterface components 2) Fix UI/UX issues 3) Optimize for real-time monitoring 4) Update components to show clear agent status 5) Ensure proper integration 6) Make user-friendly for Sandra. This is NOT analysis - implement all fixes with actual file modifications.
